Preference.android:title: 4chan - /a/
Preference.android:summary: A great guide on starting to learn japanese. Follow the guide for learning Hiragana and Katakana. Will open in google docs (if installed)

The way I learned Hiragana. Uses visual aids to help memorize all the Hiragana. At the end of each section, instead of going to 'realkana', just come back into the app, and chose whick kana to show under 'Options > Customize displayed characters'

Preference.android:title: Georgia Tech - Katakana Mnemonics
Preference.android:summary: The way I learned Katakana. A document from the Georgia Tech college website demonstrating Katakana mnemonics, similar to the Hiragana mnemonics from the Tofugu site.
